messages.BakePanel.label: Bake
messages.BakePanel.start_1: To get started, press 'Autodetect All' above.
messages.BakePanel.start_2: Then if the settings look right, press 'Copy and Bake'
messages.BakePanel.panel_render_error: ERROR! Panel is unable to render!
messages.BakePanel.feature_set_unavailable: This feature set is unavaliable with the current platform selection.
messages.BakePanel.generaloptions.label: General options:
messages.BakePanel.gmod_options.label: Gmod Options:
messages.BakePanel.platforms.label: Platforms:
messages.BakePanel.overlapfix.label: Overlap fix:
messages.BakePanel.bakepasses.label: Bake passes:
messages.BakePanel.bakepasses.desc: The different PBR effects to generate from the source material.
messages.BakePanel.generaloptions.desc: General options that apply to all platforms regardless of target.
messages.BakePanel.material_groupings.label: Material Groupings
messages.BakePanel.material_grouping.label: Image Group
messages.BakePanel.alpha.label: Alpha:
messages.BakePanel.warning_errors: There are currently errors! Check the errors tab for more info!
messages.Scene.bake_resolution.label: Resolution
messages.Scene.bake_resolution.desc: Output resolution for the textures.\n- 2048 is typical for desktop use.\n- 1024 is reccomended for the Quest
messages.Scene.bake_use_decimation.label: Decimate
messages.Scene.bake_use_decimation.desc: Reduce polycount before baking, then use Normal maps to restore detail
messages.Scene.bake_generate_uvmap.label: Generate UVMap
messages.Scene.bake_generate_uvmap.desc:
Re-pack islands for your mesh to a new non-overlapping UVMap.
Only disable if your UVs are non-overlapping already.
This will leave any map named "Detail Map" alone.
Uses UVPackMaster where available for more efficient UVs, make sure the window is showing
messages.Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.label: Overlap correction
messages.Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.desc: Method used to prevent overlaps in UVMap
messages.Scene.bake_prioritize_face.label: Prioritize Eyes
messages.Scene.bake_prioritize_face.desc: Scale any UV islands attached to the head/eyes by a given factor.
messages.Scene.bake_face_scale.label: Eyes Scale
messages.Scene.bake_face_scale.desc: How much to scale up the face/eyes portion of the textures.
messages.Scene.bake_quick_compare.label: Quick compare
messages.Scene.bake_quick_compare.desc: Move output avatar next to existing one to quickly compare
messages.Scene.bake_illuminate_eyes.label: Set eyes to full brightness
messages.Scene.bake_illuminate_eyes.desc: Relight LeftEye and RightEye to be full brightness.\nWithout this, the eyes will have the shadow of the surrounding socket baked in,\nwhich doesn't animate well
messages.Scene.bake_pass_smoothness.label: Smoothness
messages.Scene.bake_pass_smoothness.desc: Bakes Roughness and then inverts the values.\nTo use this, it needs to be packed to the Alpha channel of either Diffuse or Metallic.\nNot neccesary if your mesh has a global roughness value
messages.Scene.bake_pass_diffuse.label: Diffuse (Color)
messages.Scene.bake_pass_diffuse.desc: Bakes diffuse, un-lighted color. Usually you will want this.\nWhile baking, this temporarily links "Metallic" to "Anisotropic Rotation" as metallic can cause issues.
messages.Scene.bake_preserve_seams.label: Preserve seams
messages.Scene.bake_preserve_seams.desc: Forces the Decimate operation to preserve vertices making up seams, preventing hard edges along seams.\nMay result in less ideal geometry.\nUse if you notice ugly edges along your texture seams.
messages.Scene.bake_pass_normal.label: Normal (Bump)
messages.Scene.bake_pass_normal.desc:
Bakes a normal (bump) map. Allows you to keep the shading of a complex object with
the geometry of a simple object. If you have selected 'Decimate', it will create a map
that makes the low res output look like the high res input.
Will not work well if you have self-intersecting islands
messages.Scene.bake_pass_ao.label: Ambient Occlusion
messages.Scene.bake_pass_ao.desc: Bakes Ambient Occlusion, non-projected shadows. Adds a significant amount of detail to your model.\nReccomended for non-toon style avatars.\nTakes a fairly long time to bake
messages.Scene.bake_pass_displacement.label: Displacement (Height)
messages.Scene.bake_pass_displacement.desc: Bakes a normalized Displacement map, according to the material displacement in Blender.\nCan add real 3d surface detail to models.\nResults are in Linear space, so make sure uncheck Color Texture in Unity.
messages.Scene.bake_pass_questdiffuse.label: Quest Diffuse (Color+AO)
messages.Scene.bake_pass_questdiffuse.desc: Blends the result of the Diffuse and AO bakes to make Quest-compatible shading.
messages.Scene.bake_pass_emit.label: Emit
messages.Scene.bake_diffuse_alpha_pack.label: Alpha Channel
messages.Scene.bake_diffuse_alpha_pack.desc: What to pack to the Diffuse Alpha channel
messages.Scene.bake_metallic_alpha_pack.label: Metallic Alpha Channel
messages.Scene.bake_metallic_alpha_pack.desc: What to pack to the Metallic Alpha channel
messages.Scene.bake_pass_alpha.label: Transparency
messages.Scene.bake_pass_alpha.desc:
Bakes transparency by connecting the last Principled BSDF Alpha input
to the Base Color input and baking Diffuse.
Not a native pass in Blender, results may vary
Unused if you are baking to Quest
messages.Scene.bake_pass_metallic.label: Metallic
messages.Scene.bake_pass_metallic.desc: Bakes metallic by connecting the last Principled BSDF Metallic input\nto the Base Color input and baking Diffuse.\nNot a native pass in Blender, results may vary
messages.Scene.bake_questdiffuse_opacity.label: AO Opacity
messages.Scene.bake_questdiffuse_opacity.desc: The opacity of the shadows to blend onto the Diffuse map.\nThis should match the unity slider for AO on the Desktop version.
messages.Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.none.de: Leave islands as they are. Use if islands don't self-intersect at all
messages.Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.unmirro: Move all face islands with positive X values over one to un-pin mirrored UVs. Solves most UV pinning issues.
messages.Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.reproje: Use blender's Smart UV Project to come up with an entirely new island layout. Tends to reduce quality.
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.none.label: None
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.transparency.label: Transparency
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.smoothness.label: Smoothness
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.specular.label: Specular
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.normal.specular.de: Pack Specular into alpha for normals. Useful for Gmod.
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.smoothness.desc: Pack Smoothness. Most efficient if you don't have transparency or metallic textures.
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.emit.desc: A single-color emission mask, for use with preapplied emission
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.emit.label: Emit Mask
messages.Scene.bake_metallic_alpha_pack.smoothnes: Pack Smoothness. Use this if your Diffuse alpha channel is already populated with Transparency
messages.Scene.draft_quality_desc: Reduce the number of samples and cap resolution at 1024, speeds up iteration
messages.Scene.bake_alpha_pack.specular.smoothnes: Smoothness, for use with Second Life
messages.Tools.twist_tutorial.label: Twistbones Tutorial
messages.Tools.twist_tutorial.desc: This will open a basic tutorial on how to setup and use these constraints. You can skip to the Unity section.
messages.tuxedo_bake.warn_missing_nodes: A material in use isn't using Nodes, fix this in the Shading tab.
messages.tuxedo_bake.preset_desktop.label: Desktop
messages.tuxedo_bake.preset_desktop.desc: Preset for producing an Excellent-rated Desktop avatar, not accounting for bones.\nThis will try to automatically detect which bake passes are relevant to your model
messages.tuxedo_bake.preset_quest.label: Quest
messages.tuxedo_bake.preset_quest.desc: Preset for producing an Excellent-rated Quest avatar, not accounting for bones.\nThis will try to automatically detect which bake passes are relevant to your model
messages.tuxedo_bake.bake.label: Copy and Bake (SLOW!)
messages.tuxedo_bake.bake.desc:
Perform the bake. Warning, this performs an actual render!
This will create a copy of your avatar to leave the original alone.
Depending on your machine and model, this could take an hour or more.
For each pass, any Value node in your materials labeled bake_<bakename> will be
set to 1.0, for more granular customization.
messages.tuxedo_bake.error.render_engine: You need to set your render engine to Cycles first!
messages.tuxedo_bake.error.render_disabled: One or more of your armature's meshes have rendering disabled!
messages.tuxedo_bake.info.success: Success! Textures and model saved to 'CATS Bake' folder next to your .blend file.
messages.tuxedo_bake.tutorial_button.label: How to use
messages.tuxedo_bake.tutorial_button.desc: This will open the Cats wiki page for the Bake panel
messages.Bake.bake_device.label: Bake Device
messages.Bake.bake_projected_light.label: Bake projected light
messages.Bake.bake_projected_light.desc: Bake the effect of emission on nearby surfaces. Results in much more realistic lighting effects, but can animate less well.
messages.Bake.bake_to_vertex_colors.label: Bake to vertex colors
messages.Bake.exclude_eyes.desc: Bakes the effect of any eye glow onto surrounding objects, but not vice-versa. Improves animation when eyes are moving around
messages.Bake.diffuse_emission_overlay.desc: Blends emission into the diffuse map, for engines without a seperate emission map
messages.Bake.cleanup_shapekeys.label: Cleanup Shapekeys
messages.Bake.specular_setup.desc: Convert Diffuse and Metallic to premultiplied Diffuse and Specular. Compatible with older engines
messages.Bake.denoise_renders.label: Denoise renders
messages.Bake.denoise_renders.desc: Denoise the resulting image after emit/AO. Reccomended as this will reduce the 'grainy' quality of inexpensive rendering..
messages.Bake.bake_device.desc: Device to bake on. GPU gives a significant speedup, but can cause issues depending on your graphics drivers.
messages.Bake.diffuse_emission_overlay.label: Diffuse Emission Overlay
messages.Bake.exclude_eyes.label: Exclude eyes
messages.Bake.keep_overlapping_islands_uvp.desc: Experimental. Try to keep UVP's lock overlapping enabled
messages.Bake.export_format.label: Export format
messages.Bake.phong_setup_source.desc: For Source engine only. Provides diffuse lighting reflections for nonmetallic objects.
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.excellent.label: Excellent
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.excellent.desc: The maximum number of tris you can have for an Excellent rating.
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.good.label: Good
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.good.desc: The maximum number of tris you can have for a Good rating.
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.quest.label: Quest
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.quest.desc: The recommended number of tris for Quest avatars.
messages.ToolPanel.decimation_panel.label: Decimate:
messages.Scene.decimation_animation_weighting.des: Weight decimation based on shape keys and vertex group overlap\nResults in better animating topology by trading off overall shape accuracy\nUse if your elbows/joints end up with bad topology
messages.Scene.decimation_animation_weighting_fac: How much influence the animation weighting has on the overall shape
messages.Scene.tuxedo_max_tris.label: Tris
messages.Scene.tuxedo_max_tris.desc: The target amount of tris after decimation
messages.Bake.generate_physics_model.desc: Generate an additional LOD used for simplified physics interactions
messages.Bake.generate_lods.desc: Generate courser decimation levels for efficient rendering.
messages.Bake.generate_lods.label: Generate LODs
messages.Bake.generate_physics_model.label: Generate Physics Model
messages.Bake.generate_upperhalf.desc: Generate the twistbones on the upper half of the bone. Usually used for upper legs.
messages.Bake.generate_upperhalf.label: Generate Upperhalf
messages.Gmod.gmod_model_name.label: Gmod Model Name
messages.Gmod.gmod_male.label: Gmod Model Is Male
messages.Gmod.gmod_model_name.desc: The name for the model in the in game menu when selecting a player model.
messages.Bake.ignore_hidden_objects.desc: Ignore currently hidden objects when copying
messages.Bake.ignore_hidden_objects.label: Ignore hidden objects
messages.Bake.image_export_format.label: Image export format
messages.Bake.image_export_format.desc: image type to use when exporting
messages.Bake.invert_green_channel.label: Invert green channel
messages.Bake.keep_overlapping_islands_uvp.label: Keep Overlapping Islands (UVP)
messages.Bake.lods.desc: LOD generation levels, as a percent of the max tris
messages.Bake.lods.label: LODs
messages.Bake.merge_twist_bones.desc: Merge any bone with 'Twist' in the name. Useful as Quest does not support constraints.
messages.Bake.merge_twist_bones.label: Merge Twist Bones
messages.Bake.specular_smoothness_overlay.desc: Merges smoothness into the specular map, for engines without a seperate smoothness map
messages.Bake.export_format.desc: Model format to use when exporting
messages.name: Name
messages.Bake.normal_alpha_pack.label: Normal Alpha Pack
messages.Bake.normal_alpha_pack.desc: What to pack to the alpha channel of the normal map
messages.Bake.optimize_solid_materials.label: Optimize Solid Materials
messages.Bake.optimize_solid_materials.desc: Optimizes solid materials by making a small area for them. AO pass will nullify
messages.Bake.pack_ao_to_metallic_green.desc: Pack Ambient Occlusion to the Green channel. Saves a texture as Unity uses G for AO, R for Metallic.
messages.Bake.pack_ao_to_metallic_green.label: Pack AO to Metallic Green
messages.Bake.phong_setup_source.label: Phong Setup (Source)
messages.Bake.physmodel_percent.label: Physmodel Percent
messages.Bake.premultiply_diffuse_w_ao.label: Premultiply Diffuse w/ AO
messages.Bake.premultiply_smoothness_w_ao.label: Premultiply Smoothness w/ AO
messages.Bake.bake_to_vertex_colors.desc: Rebake to vertex colors after initial bake. Avoids an entire extra texture, if your colors are simple enough. Incorperates AO.
messages.Bake.cleanup_shapekeys.desc: Remove backup shapekeys in the final result, e.g. 'Key1 - Reverted' or 'blink_old'
messages.Bake.sharpen_bakes.label: Sharpen bakes
messages.Bake.sharpen_bakes.desc: Sharpen resampled images after baking diffuse/smoothness/metallic. Reccomended as any sampling will cause blur.
messages.BakePanel.advanced_general_options.label: Advanced General Options:
messages.Bake.invert_green_channel.desc: Source engine uses an inverse green channel, this fixes that on export
messages.Bake.specular_alpha_channel.label: Specular Alpha Channel
messages.Bake.specular_setup.label: Specular Setup
messages.Bake.specular_smoothness_overlay.label: Specular Smoothness Overlay
messages.Bake.translate_bone_names.desc: Target another bone naming standard when exporting. Requires standard bone names
messages.Bake.unwrap_angle.desc: The angle Reproject uses when unwrapping. Larger angles yield less islands but more stretching and smaller does opposite
messages.Bake.translate_bone_names.label: Translate bone names
messages.Bake.unwrap_angle.label: Unwrap Angle
messages.Bake.specular_alpha_channel.desc: What to pack to the Alpha channel of Specularity
messages.Bake.apply_current_shapekeys.desc: When selected, currently active shape keys will be applied to the basis. This is extremely beneficial to performance if your avatar is intended to 'default' to one shapekey
messages.Bake.premultiply_smoothness_w_ao.desc: While not technically accurate, this avoids the 'shine effect' on obscured portions of your model
messages.Scene.decimation_remove_doubles.label: Remove Doubles
messages.Scene.decimation_remove_doubles.desc: Uncheck this if you get issues with this checked
messages.BakePanel.nosource_1: To use Tuxedo Source features, you must use the BlenderSourceTools addon.
messages.BakePanel.nosource_2: The currently running script may also have hit a critical error.
messages.BakePanel.nosource_3: Performing an undo is highly suggested.
messages.BakePanel.warn_using_cpu: No render device configured below. Bake will use CPU
messages.BakePanel.warn_no_cycles_addon: Cycles addon not found! Please install or enable the cycles addon for blender.
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.desc: What to do with objects marked as Props
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.label: Prop objects
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.none.desc: Treat as ordinary objects and bake in
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.none.label: None
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.generate.label: Generate Bones/Animations
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.generate.desc: Generate prop bones and animations for toggling
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.remove.label: Remove
messages.BakePanel.prop_handling.remove.desc: Remove completely, for platforms with no animation support
messages.BakePanel.manual.desc: Bake will take island information from any UVMap named 'Target' from your meshes, else it will default to the render-active one. Decimation works better when there's only one giant island per loose mesh!
messages.BakePanel.manual.label: Manual
messages.BakePanel.manual_no_pack.desc: Bake will take island information from any UVMap named 'Target' from your meshes. This will not move them so when all meshes are selected with the uv map active they cannot overlap. If there is no 'Target' map it will default to the render-active one. Decimation works better when there's only one giant island per loose mesh!
messages.BakePanel.manual_no_pack.label: Manual Don't Pack
messages.Tools.attach_clothes_err1_1: An already rigged body and other meshes required!
messages.Tools.attach_clothes_err1_2: Make sure the body is the one highlighted.
messages.Tools.attach_clothes_err1_3: Works with any mesh that conforms closely to the body.
messages.Tools.anim_weight_incl_shapekeys.name: Include Shapekeys
messages.Tools.anim_weight_incl_shapekeys.desc: Factor shapekeys into animation weighting. Disable if your model has large body shapekeys.
messages.BakePanel.WarningPanel.label: Warnings:
messages.Gmod.steam_library.label: Steam Library
messages.Gmod.steam_library.desc: The automatically detected steam library that holds your gmod install. Please report to https://github.com/feilen/tuxedo-blender-plugin/issues if this is incorrect!
messages.GmodPanel.gmod_visibility.shown_by_defau: Whether the mesh should be visible by default in game
Whether the mesh should be togglable via body groups in game through the character menu
messages.BakePanel.garrys_mod_detect.desc: Preset for generating a garrys mod character, and even auto installing the addon.
messages.BakePanel.second_life_detect.desc: Preset for producing a single-material Second Life Mesh avatar
messages.BakePanel.all_detect.desc: Attempt to bake all possible output platforms. Not significantly slower than baking for any one platform
messages.BakePanel.all_detect.label: Autodetect All
messages.BakePanel.add_copyonly.label: Set CopyOnly
messages.BakePanel.add_copyonly.desc: Only copy the selected meshes, make no attempt to bake them.
messages.BakePanel.remove_copyonly.label: Unset CopyOnly
messages.BakePanel.remove_copyonly.desc: Default behavior, bake in if visible
messages.BakePanel.add_prop.label: Set Prop
messages.BakePanel.add_prop.desc: Generate ~Prop bones and enable/disable animations for the selected meshes.
messages.BakePanel.remove_prop.label: Unset Prop
messages.BakePanel.remove_prop.desc: Disables prop bone generation for the selected meshes.
messages.Bake.debug_bad_object: For Tuxedo bake: you should CTRL+Z
messages.Bake.error_save_file: You need to save your .blend somewhere first!
messages.Tools.fit_clothes.label: Attach to selected
messages.Tools.fit_clothes.desc: Auto-rig all selected clothes to the active body. Should have next to no clipping, but its a good idea to delete internal geometry anyway
messages.Tools.repair_shapekeys.label: Repair Broken Shapekeys
messages.Tools.repair_shapekeys.desc: Attempt to repair messed up shapekeys caused by some Blender operations
messages.Tools.smart_decimate.label: Smart Decimate
messages.Tools.smart_decimate.desc: Decimate all meshes attached to the selected armature, preserving shapekeys.
messages.SmartDecimation.decimated_some_meshes: Decimated some meshes that went over the individual mesh polygon limit of
messages.Tools.gen_twist_bones.label: Generate Twist Bones
messages.Tools.gen_twist_bones.desc: Attempt to generate twistbones for the selected bones
messages.Tools.convert_to_secondlife.label: Convert Bones To Second Life
messages.Tools.convert_to_secondlife.desc: Uses a dictionary of known bone names to convert all main bone names to second life.
messages.Tools.convert_bones.fail: Failed to translate {translate_bone_fails} bones! They will be merged to their parent bones.
messages.Tools.convert_bones_resonite.fail: Failed to translate {translate_bone_fails} bones! These may be dynamic bones.
messages.Tools.convert_to_valve.label: Convert Bones To Valve
messages.Tools.convert_to_valve.desc: Uses a dictionary of known bone names to convert all main bone names to default valve bone names.
messages.Tools.export_gmod_addon.desc: Compile and export as Gmod playermodel addon to your addons. May not always work.
messages.Tools.export_gmod_addon.label: Export Gmod Addon
messages.FT.select_shapes_1: Select shape keys to create FT shape keys.
messages.FT.select_shapes_2: Specifying above will attempt to create them for you.
messages.FT.select_shapes_3: Currently requires rotation to be applied.
messages.FT.mesh_missing: Select the mesh with face shape keys.
messages.GmodPanel.gmod_not_found: Your gmod install was not found! Check Warnings!
messages.advanced_platform_options_desc: Advanced platform options like export formats and data generators like for physics models.
messages.GmodPanel.panel_desc: The different options to use when compiling a Garry's Mod model.
messages.ToolPanel.tools.label: Tools
messages.Tuxedo.welcome.label: Welcome
messages.FixModel.Warning.2: This is due to it's highly destructive nature, and it didn't fix anything.
messages.FixModel.Warning.3: The tools that Tuxedo provides can be used to do everything fix model could.
messages.FixModel.Warning.4: These tools are non destructive, undoable, and don't ruin your model.
messages.Tools.shapekey_to_basis.desc: make this shapekey the default position of the mesh,
messages.Tools.shapekey_to_basis.label: Shapekey To Basis
messages.Tools.delete_zero_weight_bones.desc: Delete bones on selected armature that weight to nothing under it.
messages.Tools.delete_zero_weight_bones.label: Delete Zero Weight Bones
messages.Tools.delete.label: Delete:
messages.Tools.general.label: General:
